alert.note: Alert for Grand; Uintah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 2:10PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Utah and northeast Utah, including the following counties, in east central Utah, Grand. In northeast Utah, Uintah. * WHEN...Until 330 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 210 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. Between 0.8 and 1.3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Hill Creek, Willow Creek, Meadow Creek and Chicken Fork. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northern Grand and South Central Uintah Counties
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
